title: BsSndRpt - Expected argument 'c'.
body: Every time i try and open league this error pops up and it wont let me go into the login screen. ive tried many times to uninstall league and reinstall it and it still won't work could someone please help me! ive looked at the same problems for other people with this on this website and it doesn't help me much

replies.body: Every time i try and open league this error pops up and it wont let me go into the login screen. ive tried many times to uninstall league and reinstall it and it still won't work could someone please help me! ive looked at the same problems for other people with this on this website and it doesn't help me much

That error can be a sign that some of the League game files might have become corrupted. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and make sure to run it with *Force Repatch* turned on. After that, run the game as administrator and let me know how that helps!
